name: Night Dwellers
description:
Hello :)

Night Dwellers is a game jam game submitted to GXC notice me game jam: https://gxc.gg/game-jam/ (hopefully the link will still work after the jam has ended).

here is a guide for the game:

controls and actions

move with awsd or arrow keys.

jump with space - charge and release.

attack with enter or z. you have a 3 part combo attack, a running attack and a ground slam (attack in the air).

press shift to use a potion that gives you a speed buff and refills part of your hp.

press down+jump while in the air to perform a dive kick.

walljump by jumping from a wall, just go into a wall and press jump, (hollow knight\celeste style as apposed to metroid\smash).

you can cancel your divekick into a walljump or a super jump by pressing jump just when you hit the ground\wall.

you can jump cancel your running attack on hit.

general guide

the game is separated into 3 parts: day, dusk and night.

in the day, collect as much exp as possible before the time runs out.

in the dusk, choose what powerups you want based on how many levels you climbed this day.

in the night, defeat monsters to increase your score.
